specific1.title: Easy Layer 2 Network Deployment
specific1.content:
Build a customizable layer 2 network with Tokamak
Network, Easier layer 2 deployment, more growth in
Tokamak Network.

specific2.title: Layer 2 Interoperability
specific2.content:
Your custom layer 2 network can be connected to any
other layer 2 in Tokamak Network, Cross-Layer Message
Protocol support network communication without going
through base layer.

specific3.title: Higher Security
specific3.content:
Staking TON provides higher security level for your layer 2
network, Tokamak Network ensure that all layer 2
networks are fully verified from day one.

specific4.title: Decentralized Governance
specific4.content:
Tokamak Network is governed by TON stakeholders.
Decentralized governance allows for network upgrade,
ecosystem expansion and protocol improvement to be
coordinated and enacted autonomously.

roadmaps.subject: Networking the Layer 2 networks
roadmaps.title: Support all types of layer 2 protocol in Tokamak Network.
contents: Support Optimistic Rollup : Optimism, Arbitrum, and more
Support Zk-Rollup : StarkEx, zkSync, and more
Support Plasma : Tokamak plasma and more

roadmaps.subject: Networking the Layer 2 networks
roadmaps.title: Integrate all layer 2 protocol with TON ecosystem
contents: Integrate all layer 2 protocols with TON seigniorage pool, PowerTON game, DAO governance
